wikipedia_page.main: Alastair James Carl Euan Rellie  (5 April 1935 – 10 April 2018) was a British intelligence officer with the Secret Intelligence Service (MI6). Alastair Rellie was one of four Directors in the British Secret Intelligence Service (MI6). He was a candidate to become Chief of SIS before retiring in 1992.

response: *Alastair Rellie, 83, British intelligence officer.Alastair James Carl Euan Rellie
